name: sinuosity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or shape of moving in a twisting, curving, or indirect way, or having many curves: The Finnish modernist architect was a master of sinuosity. The river then moves in a northerly direction for seven miles, without any sinuosity.
More examplesFewer examplesHer paintings distorted anatomy to enhance the sinuosity of a pose.She admired the subtle sinuosities of his thinking.The candles lit up the white shell-like sinuosities of her little ears.
